column4: Compact in size，Fully dynamic charging power1.4- 22kW, 1 and 3 phase charging，Preset charging power & delay charging time，6A, 10A, 13A, 16A, 20A, 25A, 32A output current can be set according to grid type，Integrated RFID reader, supports whitelisting of RFID tags，Residual current protection: Type A + DC 6 mA，Over current, over voltage, under voltage, surge, short circuit, ground fault, over temperature, leakage, and sticking of relay detection，Equipped for 2W area light，1.3" OLED LCD display，LED status indicators: power, connection, charging and malfunction，Optional for the socket or fixed cable version
